mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_module (module_name, module_path, module_type, module_key, create_time) values (#{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modulePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moduleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_module set module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_path = #{modulePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_type = #{moduleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, module_key = #{moduleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, module_name, module_path, module_type, module_key, create_time from t_module
